title: Tabloid Site TMZ Claims NFL Did Not Seek Ray Rice Footage
teaser: Celebrity gossip site TMZ is claiming the NFL never asked for footage showing former Baltimore Ravens player punching his then-fiancee, Janay.
contentencoded:
Celebrity gossip site TMZ is claiming the NFL never asked for footage showing former Baltimore Ravens player Ray Rice punching his then-fiancee, Janay, in a Las Vegas casino elevator, causing her to black out.

TMZ released the footage yesterday, resulting in the Ravens terminating Rice’s contract and the NFL suspending him indefinitely.

There was public outrage when Rice received a two game suspension after video surfaced in February of Rice dragging his unconscious fiancee out of the elevator.

Here & Now‘s Robin Young speaks to Juliet Macur, a sports columnist for the New York Times, about the new footage.

  • Here & Now: A Fan Says No To Football

Guest

  •  Juliet Macur, Sports of the Times columnist for the New York Times. She tweets @JulietMacur.
